text:
Since StandardWrapperValve eats IOExceptions, error-page's
with exception-type java.io.IOException don't work. Tomcat
3 doesn't work this way. (And, for what it's worth, neither
does Jetty)
creator: apache-bugzilla@distributopia.com
remm@apache.org
text: Fixed in HEAD. Nightly for 02/09 will have the fix.
